title: How to publish on Apple Books - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s two ways to do it: You can publish using iBooks Author (a free app from the Apple App Store), orYou can upload your ePub file to Smashwords Direct. The benefit of using Smashwords Direct is that your work can also be distributed to many other eRetailers.I’d recommend throwing your net wider, and publish to Kindle Direct Publishing (eBook and physical dead-tree book), and to Smashwords Direct. That way your work will reach the widest possible audience. If you have any questions, lease feel free to ask; I help get authors published every day.

The easiest way, since the Apple application process is a pain (IMO), is to go through Smashwords or Draft2Digital. They act as distributors to many different ebook retailers, which makes it much easier than making an account at each retailer.
